summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; establishing a "Police Department Horse Patrol" sub-account in the General Donations and Gift Trust Fund, directing the deposit into such sub-account of donations for said Police Department Unit, accepting donations from the "Save Our Steeds" Committee for such purpose, both abrogating and creating positons in the Seattle Police Department, and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1982 Budget of the Seattle Police Department by reappropriation and transfer and appropriation of such donations.
